channel.title: [FM] Random Rolemadness Madness v3.0 { Game end } - Mafia (MrEevee7/KyoDaz/Solic/htm) wins
channel.description:
# [color=randomic]Random Rolemadness Madness[/color] :carousel_horse: _Co-hosted by @BlueStorm and revised by @Geyde_ **Welcome to the Random Rolemadness Madness!** This setup follows standard mafia rules, but all roles are randomly selected [of this list](https://www.mafiauniverse.com/forums/database/mafia-roles/). Because, you know, being the Alpha Townie is a dream.
The setup is infinite by nature, following the rule of `town = scum*3.5` Any players in "excess" will be neutrals (ie, 20er will be a 4/14/2) I will roll exclusively [third party](https://www.mafiauniverse.com/forums/database/mafia-roles/?roletype=Third%20Party) roles for neutrals. Third party roles can't be rolled by neither mafia nor town.
### [color=randomic]Gameplay[/color] Balance is not guaranteed. Cycles are 48/24, or shorter if someone is lynched We are going to do majority + plurality. There are no logs, but there can be death notes. Private chats of a kind will be done in PMs. When you receive a card you will have 24 hours to reply, confirming you have received it Feedback is limited, only investigative roles will be aware of occupations or redirections I will add modifiers to a role if it is recommended by its description (normally being 3-shot or 1-shot). Any role can be from any alignment.
### [color=randomic]To Join[/color] To join, simply express interest in joining by saying something like "I want to join" or "/join" or "/in" or "sign me up, coach" or whatever you want
### [color=randomic]Rolecards[/color]
[details="Town"] > ## [color=green]Town Bodyguard[/color] > You are the Bodyguard, aligned with the Town! You have the following ability. > _The Bodyguard may each night target a player and protect them from death by dying in their stead if they're targeted for death._ > **Goal: Defeat the Mafia and all neutrals who seek to do you harm** [/details]
[details="Mafia"] > ## [color=red]Mafia Bodyguard[/color] > You are the Bodyguard, aligned with the Mafia! You have the following ability. > _The Bodyguard may each night target a player and protect them from death by dying in their stead if they're targeted for death._ > **Goal: Defeat the Town and all neutrals who seek to do you harm** [/details]
[details="Neutral"] > ## [color=gray]Zombie[/color] > You are the Zombie, all by yourself. You have the following ability. > _The Zombie infects a player each night and wins if the number of infected players ever outnumber the number of healthy players._ > **Goal: The number of infected players ever outnumber the number of healthy players.** [/details]
### [color=randomic]Players[/color] 1. ~~Magnus~~ (Lynched D2, was town) 2. SogMan 3. ~~Cheeki > Marshal~~ (Died N4, was town) 4. ~~WazzaAzza > MathBlade~~ (Died N2, was town) 5. ~~Sulit~~ (Died N1, was town) 6. ~~MrEevee7~~ (Lynched D3, was mafia) 7. Centuries 8. ~~PKR~~ (Lynched D4, was town) 9. Scythe > KyoDaz 10. ~~moth :bulb: > Insanity~~ (Died N4, was town) 11. Solic 12. [jmwjmw27](https://forum.imperium42.com/u/jmwjmw27) 13. DatBird 14. ~~DasModel~~ (Died D3, was neutral) 16. ~~[SirDerpsAlot](https://forum.imperium42.com/u/SirDerpsAlot)~~ (Died D2, was town) 17. Htm 18. ~~Alice~~ (Died N1, was town) 19. ~~NetherNitro > James~~ (died N4, was town)
#### [color=randomic]Backups[/color]
#### [color=randomic]Spectators[/color]
### [color=randomic]Milestones:[/color] [Sunflower rebellion falls](https://previews.123rf.com/images/cymontaylor/cymontaylor1711/cymontaylor171100002/89355836-dead-sunflower-on-the-field.jpg) [Day 1 starts](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/fm-random-rolemadness-madness-v3-0-day-2-16-18-replacement-needed/77685/157?u=mercenary) [Day 2 starts](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/fm-random-rolemadness-madness-v3-0-day-2-16-18-replacement-needed/77685/703?u=mercenary) [ITA - SirDerpsALot](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/fm-random-rolemadness-madness-v3-0-day-4-10-18-a-wise-general-cuts-losses-and-regroups/77685/2009?u=mercenary) [Day 3 starts](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/fm-random-rolemadness-madness-v3-0-day-3-13-18-press-f-for-theater/77685/2069?u=mercenary) [ITA - DasModel](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/fm-random-rolemadness-madness-v3-0-day-4-10-18-a-wise-general-cuts-losses-and-regroups/77685/2595?u=mercenary) [Day 4 starts](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/fm-random-rolemadness-madness-v3-0-day-4-10-18-a-wise-general-cuts-losses-and-regroups/77685/2598) [Day 5 starts](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/fm-random-rolemadness-madness-v3-0-day-5-7-18-and-he-gave-bread-to-his-loved-ones-until-the-end/77685/3266?u=mercenary)
